name: Twyruss
description:
Twyruss is a fun little Gyruss-inspired game/fidget that I made in a couple of hours in PICO-8 for TweetTweetJam4. The challenge of this jam was to create something fun to play in 560 characters (chars) or less.

While my initial idea had to be modified significantly, I was very happy to get this as pleasant-looking as it is in 555 chars.

Gameplay: Match your color with the orbs and bump into them to clear out your halo

Controls: 

  • Z/X to cycle colors
  • Left/Right arrows to slide your cursor around the halo
